channel.title: Morning Score
channel.description: Delivered every Monday by 10 a.m., Weekly Score is your guide to the year-round campaign cycle.

item.title: 5 big questions for this year’s midterms
item.description: 2026 will provide major tests for both parties.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: How Turning Point is influencing Arizona's GOP
item.description: Two upcoming primary elections could show just how far the organization has reshaped the state GOP in its own image.
item.dc:creator: By Gregory Svirnovskiy and Andrew Howard
item.dc:contributor: By Gregory Svirnovskiy and Andrew Howard

item.title: Dems are taking (some) credit for bills they voted against
item.description: It’s a tale as old as time.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: Dem-aligned group wants to spend $100M flipping red House seats
item.description: The anti-Trump Save America Movement is making its first play in electoral politics.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: One Democrat's plan to bring back rural voters
item.description: It’s an approach that fits squarely into Democrats’ attempts to retool their economic messaging.
item.dc:creator: By Lisa Kashinsky and Andrew Howard
item.dc:contributor: By Lisa Kashinsky and Andrew Howard

item.title: Where the redistricting fight stands (for now)
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: The next Democrat Indivisible wants to boot from Congress
item.description: Ed Case has long been a target of his party’s left flank.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: All politics is… national?
item.description: An increasingly bifurcated electorate leads candidates and ad makers to focus less and less on localized concerns and more on national politics.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard
